purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 蝉)
Pictophonetic: 單 indicates the sound; 虫 (insect) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
蟬聯 [ chán lián ]: to continue in a post; (to hold a post) several times in succession; (to win a title) in successive years; to stay at number one; to defend a championship
蟬翼 [ chán yì ]: cicada's wing; fig. diaphanous; delicate texture
蟬蛻 [ chán tuì ]: cicada slough; fig. to free oneself; to extricate oneself from
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 虫 [ chóng ] insect, worm; mollusk
    • 單 [ dān ] single, individual, only; lone
heisig_chinese_memo: On the list of insects, cicadas come in first for swarm size.
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the simple (單) insect (虫) is a cicada
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Cicadas are the most simple insects on the list: they just pop out of the ground, mate, and die, albeit only every ten years or so.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " worm " to " single " sound. " Cicada " is the name of an insect, a general term for the cicada family, also known as "Zhilai" and "Zhiyan". Cicada larvae live in the soil and feed on the roots of plants. The adults live on trees and feed on sap for a living. Male abdomen has a pronunciation device, which can make continuous sounds. "Said the text": "Cicada, who sings by the side. From the insect, single sound." Such as "Xunzi. "General": "Those who drink but do not eat are also cicadas." "Historical Records. "The Biography of Qu Yuan Jia Sheng": "Among the mud of Zhuannao, the cicadas slough out of the filthy filth, except for the floating dust, without the filth of the world, but also those who are in the mud but not muddled."

The tweet of " Cicada " is continuous, so " Cicada " is extended to mean continuous. "dialect. Volume One: "Cicada, Continued." Such as "Han Shu. "The First Story of Yang Xiong": "There is Cicada Yanxi of Zhou's family, or the originator of Yu Fenyu." Yan Shigu's commentary quoted Ying Shao and said: "Cicada Yan, Lian Ye, Yan is connected with Zhou's family." Yang Jiong of Tang Dynasty "Tang Shangqi Duwei Gaojun Shendao Monument": "The talents are upright and beautiful, and the characters rise from time to time."

Cicada wings are very thin, so "Cicada Wings" are often used as a metaphor for things that are extremely light and thin. "Jijiu Pian" "Cicada with the scorpion and sickle", Yan Shi's ancient note: "Cicada, the frivolous person is like the cicada's wings." Such as "Chu Ci. Chapter Nine. "Bu Ju": "The world is muddy and unclear, the cicada's wings are important, and the juncture is light." Hong Xingzu's supplementary note quoted Li Shanyun: "Cicadas' wings are weak in words." Guo Ziyi of the Tang Dynasty "Jin Ci Qianqian Edict self-reported table": " Chende has thin wings, fate a feather, and is tired of the grace of the country, and the toilets are in line."
humanum_short_description_en: From " worm " to " single " sound. " Cicada " is the name of an insect, a general term for the cicada family.
humanum_full_description:
從「虫」，「單」聲。「蟬」是昆蟲名，乃蟬科動物的通稱，又名「知了」、「蜘蟟」。蟬的幼蟲生活在土裡，吸食植物的根部。成蟲後生活在樹上，吸食樹汁為生。雄性腹部有發音器，能發出連續不斷的聲音。《說文》：「蟬，以旁鳴者。从虫，單聲。」如《荀子．大略》：「飲而不食者，蟬也。」《史記．屈原賈生列傳》：「濯淖汙泥之中，蟬蛻於濁穢，以浮游塵埃之外，不獲世之滋垢，皭然泥而不滓者也。」

　　「蟬」的鳴叫連續不斷，故「蟬」引申表示連續不斷。《方言．卷一》：「蟬，續也。」如《漢書．揚雄傳上》：「有周氏之蟬嫣兮，或鼻祖於汾隅。」顏師古注引應劭曰：「蟬嫣，連也，言與周氏親連也。」唐代楊炯〈唐上騎都尉高君神道碑〉：「英才磊落而秀發，人物蟬聯而間起。」

　　蟬的翅膀非常薄，故「蟬翼」常用以比喻極輕極薄的事物。〈急就篇〉「綈絡鐮練素帛蟬」，顏師古注：「蟬，謂繒之輕薄者若蟬翼也。」如《楚辭．九章．卜居》：「世溷濁而不清，蟬翼為重，千鈞為輕。」洪興祖補注引李善云：「蟬翼，言薄也。」唐代郭子儀〈進賜前後詔敕自陳表〉：「臣德薄蟬翼，命輕鴻毛，累蒙國恩，猥廁朝列。」
humanum_short_description: 從「虫」，「單」聲。「蟬」是昆蟲名，乃蟬科動物的通稱。

Pictophonetic: 單 indicates the sound; 虫 (insect) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 虫 [ chóng ] insect, worm; mollusk
    • 單 [ dān ] single, individual, only; lone
①昆蟲，種類很多，雄的腹面有發聲器，叫的聲音很大：蟬聯。蟬蛻。蟬韻(蟬鳴)。寒蟬。金蟬脫殼。
②古代的一種薄綢，薄如蟬翼：蟬紗。
蟬聯 [ chán lián ]: to continue in a post; (to hold a post) several times in succession; (to win a title) in successive years; to stay at number one; to defend a championship

蟬蛻 [ chán tuì ]: cicada slough; fig. to free oneself; to extricate oneself from

Kind: traditional

蟬字的基本解释

蟬
chán
见“蝉”。

蟬字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chán］
［《廣韻》市連切，平仙，禪。］
“蝉1”的繁体字。“蟺2”的被通假字。
(1)昆虫名。夏秋间由幼虫蜕化而成，吸树汁为生。雄的腹部有发声器，能连续发声。种类很多。俗称蜘蟟、知了。
(2)古代一种极薄的丝织品。以其薄如蝉翼而得名。
(3)古代侍从官的冠饰。
(4)指蝉冠。
(5)“蟬鬢”的省称。
(6)连续。
(7)通“嬋”。参见“蟬蜎”、“蟬娟”。
(8)通“蟾”。参见“蟬蜍”、“蟬機”。
(9)通“鱓”。参见“蟬蛇”。
[②]［tí］
［《集韻》田黎切，平齊，定。］
“蝉2”的繁体字。
黏蝉，汉代县名。在今朝鲜境内。
[③]［shàn］
［《洪武正韻》上演切，上銑］
“蝉3”的繁体字。
见“蜿蟬”。

蟬字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　蟬； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1097第31
【唐韻】市連切【集韻】【韻會】時連切，?音禪。【揚子·方言】蟬，楚謂之蜩。【古今注】齊王后忿死，尸變爲蟬。登庭時嘒唳而鳴，王悔恨，故世名蟬曰齊女也。【大戴禮】蟬飮而不食。【酉陽雜俎】蟬未蛻時名復育。【蠡海集】蟬近陽，依于木，以隂而爲聲。　又【後漢·輿服志】侍中中常侍黃金璫，附蟬爲文，貂尾爲飾。【古今注】貂者，取其有文采而不炳煥。蟬，取其淸虛識變也。　又蟬嫣，連也。【前漢·揚雄傳】有周氏之蟬嫣兮，或鼻祖于汾隅。　又【揚子·方言】蟬，毒也。　又車名。【鹽鐵論】推車之蟬攫，負子之敎也。【註】許愼曰：蟬攫，車類也。　又人名。【大戴禮】顓頊產窮蟬。　又與嬋通。【成公綏·嘯賦】蔭脩竹之蟬蜎。　又【集韻】財仙切，音錢。同?，蟲名。　又田黎切，音提。地名。【前漢·地理志】樂浪郡黏蟬。　又【正韻】上演切，音善。蜿蟬，舞盤曲貌。【王逸·九思】乗六蛟兮蜿蟬。【註】羣蛟之形也。　或作蟺。

蟬字的源字形

金文小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体旧字形
蟬字的起名意思

暂无。

cicada
Basic explanation of words
cicada
chán
See "Cicada".
cicada
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chán］
["Guangyun" City Lianqie, Pingxian, Zen. ]
Traditional characters for "Cicada 1". "蟺2" was passed falsely.
(1) The name of the insect. It is formed by larvae in summer and autumn, sucking sap for a living. The male has a sound generator in his abdomen, which can make continuous sound. many kinds of. Commonly known as the spider 蟟, Zhiguo.
(2) An extremely thin silk fabric in ancient times. It is named after its thin as cicada wings.
(3) The crown decorations of ancient servants.
(4) Refers to the cicada crown.
(5) The provincial name of "Cicada Temple".
(6) Continuous.
(7) Through "chan". See "Cicada Cicada", "Cicada Juan".
(8) Through "toad". See "Cicada", "Cicada Machine".
(9) Through "鱓". See "Cicada Snake".
[②]［tí］
["Jiyun" Tian Liqie, level, set. ]
Traditional characters for "Cicada 2".
Sticky cicada, the name of a county in the Han Dynasty. In today's North Korea.
[③]［shàn］
["Hongwu Zhengyun" staged cutting and milling]
Traditional characters for "Cicada 3".
See "Winding Cicada".
cicada
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　 Cicada; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 1097 31
[Tang Yun] City Lianqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Shi Lianqie, sound Zen. [Yangtze Dialect] The cicada is called the cicada in Chu. [Ancient and Modern Note] Queen Qi died in anger, and the corpse became a cicada. When he entered the court, he blew, the king regretted, so the cicada was called Qi female. [Big Dai Li] The cicadas eat without eating. 【Youyang Miscellaneous】The name of the cicada regenerates when it has not shed. [Lihai Collection] The cicada is near the sun, relying on the wood, and the sound is made from the yin.　[Later Han·Yufuzhi] Shi Zhongzhong often serves Huang Jinxuan, with cicadas as articles and mink tail as ornaments. [Annotation from ancient to modern] Mink, whoever has literary talent, but not Binghuan. Cicada, whichever is imaginary change also.　Cicada Yan again, even. [Previous Han·Yang Xiong Biography] There is the cicada Yanxi of the Zhou family, or the originator of Yu Fenyu.　[Yangtze Dialect] Cicada is also poisonous.　Also the name of the car. [Salt and Iron Theory] The cicada grabs the cart, and the bearer is the pick. [Note] Xu Yan said: Cicadas are also cars.　Another name. [Big Dai Li] Zhuan Xu produces poor cicadas.　And Chan is connected again. [Chenggong Sui·Xiao Fu] Cicada cicadas in the shade of repairing bamboo.　[Jiyun] Caixian cut, sound money. Same as?, insect name.　 Then Tian Liqie, Yin Ti. Place name. [Pre-Han·Geography] Lelang County sticky cicadas.　[Zheng Yun] staged cut, sound good. Winding cicadas, dancing and singing appearance. 【Wang Yi·Jiusi】Take the six dragons and bend the cicadas. [Note] The shape of the group Jiao is also.　Or Zuoyun.
